39982.name: TIMSS: Mean performance on the science scale for fourth grade students, total
39982.description: TIMSS: Mean performance on the science scale for fourth grade students, total is the average scale score for 4th graders on the science assessment. The scale centerpoint is 500. Data reflects country performance in the stated year according to TIMSS reports, but may not be comparable across years or countries. Consult the TIMSS website for more detailed information: http://timss.bc.edu/
39982.s_name: World Bank EdStats: TIMSS: Mean performance on the science scale for fourth grade students, total

source.name: World Bank EdStats: TIMSS: Mean performance on the science scale for fourth grade students, total
source.dataPublisherSource: International Association for the Evaluation of Educational Achievement (IEA)'s Trends in International Mathematics and Science Study
